welcome_message_body: Welcome to Port Sudan, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this unique destination has to offer.

restaurants.name: Seegala (السقالة)
restaurants.description: Seegala (السقالة) is a fish and chips shop located in the city.

restaurants.name: Harvest (هارفيست)
restaurants.description: Harvest (هارفيست) is a diner located in Red Sea.
restaurants.address: هارفيست Harvest (جوار دريم), Red Sea, Port Sudan 33311

restaurants.name: Bashaer Seafood (البشائر للاسماك)
restaurants.description: Bashaer Seafood (البشائر للاسماك) is a seafood restaurant located in Port Sudan بورتسودان.
restaurants.address: Alsegalla السقالة (Abu Hasheesh Rd. شارع ابو حشيش), Port Sudan بورتسودان, Red Sea ألبحر ألأحمر

restaurants.name: Rwakeeb رواكيب
restaurants.description: Rwakeeb رواكيب is a café located in the city.

restaurants.name: بكري ماكس للفول
restaurants.description: بكري ماكس للفول is a restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Sudan Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
